title: Vampire Princess Miyu
creator_credit: Manga Entertainment, Yasushi Nomura, Toru Miura, Eri Tsukamoto and Toshihiro Hirano
brief_description: Eerie exploits of a childlike vampire, Princess Miyu, who travels between two worlds - the human realm and and a strange underworld of demon gods and lost souls. Two chapters of her story are included in this videocassette. In ‘Capital of mystery’ the search is on to find the evil force which is killing the women of Kyoto. Princess Miyu in the second episode ‘Puppet festival’ must defeat the evil vampire Ranka whose kiss turns mortals into puppets.
